thread.title: eKuber Wins Department of Commerce Salesforce CRM Project
thread.title_full: eKuber Wins Department of Commerce Salesforce CRM Project

author: admin
title: eKuber Wins Department of Commerce Salesforce CRM Project
text:
eKuber Ventures Inc. 
VIENNA, Va., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- eKuber has won the Department of Commerce CRM project to develop and integrate services to support the development and implementation of a Salesforce Customer and Relationship Management and Performance System which will be replacing a legacy system. eKuber will provide subject matter, project management, and technical expertise for this project. 
"I am humbled and honored for the trust and confidence reposed in us by DOC and am grateful to all of our employees," said Mr. Ajay Srivastava, President of eKuber, "Salesforce has been a great company to partner with, particularly on our two largest and very successful projects at GSA OCIO and Philadelphia 311." 
eKuber recently won GSA TSS BPA's First Task Order for Performance.gov initiative to support OMB and 22 other agencies and recently went live with Washington Metropolitan Airport Authority's website on Drupal www.MWAA.com a fully mobile, responsive website with virtual navigation features, first of its kind for any airport in USA. 
eKuber was named 1) 2013 Computerworld Honors Laureate in Economic Development category for its work on GSA OCIO. eKuber's work leading the Cloud, Collaboration and CRM Initiatives at GSA helped GSA to garner the 2) 2013 Excellence.gov award for GSA's "Drive to Cloud Phase 2 - Implementing Cloud Based Collaboration and Business Application Platform ". eKuber was also a 3) finalist on 2014 ACT-IAC Igniting Innovation Award 4) was recognized for Philadelphia 311 Salesforce CRM implementation and named to 5) 2014 CIO Review: Top 20 Most Promising Tech Consulting Providers. 
About eKuber: eKuber Ventures Inc ., is an SBA certified SDB/Woman Owned (EDWOSB/WOSB) Information Technology and Management Consulting Professional Services firm. eKuber helps federal clients achieve agency goals and breakthrough performance through formulation and execution of strategic innovative solutions and cutting edge information technology. 
Expert on Agile methodology, eKuber is known for its excellence in performance and delivery on end to end full lifecycle projects from requirements, design, development, implementation and post-production support and O&M in Web, Open Source and Cloud Applications Development like Salesforce, Drupal, Java, Hadoop, .Net as well as Mobile Platforms like Android, IOS (with Geo-fencing and Geo-Location) and Big Data/DataAnalytics -Microstrategy, OBIEE, Tableau and Jaspersoft. eKuber has been consistently praised by their clients for their flawless execution and superior performance.
